questions.question: This arc features a battle on an island with a giant tree, where Luffy and crew face off against a Warlord of the Sea and a corrupt king. What is...?
This arc features the Straw Hat Pirates' encounter with a group of powerful fish-men and a former Warlord of the Sea. What is...?
Taking place on a mysterious, moving island, this arc introduces the Mink Tribe and reveals new information about the world. What is...?
Rarely seen and highly respected, this form of Haki allows its user to exert their willpower over others, knocking out those with weaker wills. What is...?
This ability, showcased by a Straw Hat crew member, grants the power to manipulate and become sand. What is...?
This technique, utilized by a member of the Straw Hat Pirates, involves creating an illusion of multiple copies. What is...?
This character, known for their control over ice and introduction in the Whole Cake Island arc, is one of the three Sweet Commanders of the Big Mom Pirates. Who is...?
This former member of the Royal Shichibukai is known for their Snake-Snake Fruit powers and role as the queen of Amazon Lily. Who is...?
This character is the leader of the Whitebeard Pirates and was known as the 'Strongest Man in the World'. Who is...?
